header.description: No scalar header tokens defined in this report.

rows.description: One row per entry in neuract__FM_TABLE ordered by timestamp_utc ascending. Displays the formatted timestamp as the row label plus six instantaneous flow readings and six cumulative totalizer readings.

totals.description: No totals rows defined in this report.

semantics: All data is sourced from neuract__FM_TABLE. Optional date_from and date_to parameters filter timestamp_utc to a specific time window. No required parameters — the full dataset is returned by default.
transformations: Format timestamp_utc as '%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S' for the FLOW METER label column (row_flow_meter).
Format all instantaneous flow readings (row_fm_101 through row_fm_106) to 2 decimal places.
Format all cumulative totalizer readings (row_fm_101_totalizer through row_fm_106_totalizer) to 2 decimal places.
Order all rows by timestamp_utc ascending.
No reshape (MELT/UNION_ALL) required — all columns come directly from a single table.
